data:
Inclusion Criteria:  Resident is unable to ingest sufficient amount of fluids orally  
Resident has persistent nausea, vomiting or diarrhea  Resident requires parenteral hydration for short trail of rehydration with clear goal and time frame (48 to 72 hours)

Exclusion Criteria:  Active respiratory congestion or risk of pulmonary edema
Moderate to severe ascites
Active bleeding or risk of bleeding due to anticoagulant or clinical condition 
Skin integrity breached

Ordering Conderations:  
Site will be changed if pain, redness or edema present and monitored per practise standard  
Solutions cannot be mixed with any medications  Additional site is required for subcutaneous medications
